#text=Yesterday I visited my hairdresser for a haircut .
#text=I went to the salon and asked for a haircut with a wash .
#text=The receptionist said it would be a 15 minute .
#text=I said that would be fine , and sat down .
#text=On the table in front of me were a selection of magazines .
#text=I picked '' `` People '' '' and browsed through it as I waited .
#text=Soon , the hairdresser called my name and I sat down in the chair .
#text=She asked me how I 'd like my hair cut .
#text=I told her I wanted a trim with some layers .
#text=She asked me if I wanted a wash .
#text=She took me first to get my hair washed .
#text=She waited until the water was warm , then started spraying my hair .
#text=Once it was soaked , she lathered my hair first with shampoo , then with conditioner .
#text=After that , she rinsed my hair off and put a towel over my head .
#text=Back in the chair , she soaked up the extra water from my hair with the towel .
#text=Then she began to style my hair .
#text=After about half an hour , my haircut was done .
#text=I took a look in the mirror and told my hair stylist she did a good job .
#text=Then I tipped her and paid my bill .
